sentence.Network_en: Moving between the worktable and the dresser, he worked with the ease of long familiarity.
sentence.Network_cn: 他往返于工作台案和放置烹就菜肴的桌子之间, 工作起来因熟而巧.

sentence.Network_en: She plodded in her perpetuating circle of stove, worktable and sink as if nothing else existed.
sentence.Network_cn: 她只是在炉子 、 工作台和水井这个永恒的小天地里辛勤地劳动,好象其余的一切都不存在似的.

sentence.Network_en: Fasten the pulley and the support block to your worktable.
sentence.Network_cn: 拴紧对你的工作台的滑车和支承区块.
